strengths: Strong experience in web development using Angular, Node.js, and MongoDB.
Proven ability to develop scalable and user-friendly applications.
Experience in integrating APIs and conducting code reviews.
Good understanding of Agile methodologies and RESTful APIs.
weaknesses: No mention of C++ development experience, which is a core requirement for the role.
Lacks experience with Qt, which is listed as an added advantage in the job description.
No evidence of experience with debugging, memory analysis, or profiling tools.
Skill set is focused on web development rather than the required C++ application development.
ai_review.comments: Santhiya Ravi has a strong background in web development but lacks the required expertise in C++ development, Qt, and related tools for this role. While her experience is impressive in other domains, it does not align with the specific requirements of this position.
